name: 12 Hours of Hanging Out With a Bunch of Weirdos
name_original: 12 Hours of Hanging Out With a Bunch of Weirdos
description:
12 HOURS OF HANGING OUT WITH A BUNCH OF WEIRDOS! That's all it is :)

Game a Week #2

Second game as part of RMIT's Game A Week, the theme for this week was "Durational".
Spread across 12 hours, meet 12 characters going about their business. Each hour is a different character!

MUSIC by my good friend Zachary Wilson

https://soundcloud.com/zendobeats

https://twitter.com/zendobeats
